entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Tests fail in x86 after the latest update with "Internal CLR error. (0x80131506)" #76219
  • CLR: static const inline std::map causing System.AccessViolationException in xtree on application exit #76210
  • LINQ Usage Survey #76205
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Allow StringSyntaxAttribute to be applied to return values. #76203
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Templates don't pass the command line arguments to the app #76201
    7.0.0
  • Unnecessary bounds check with ulong index #76198
    8.0.0
  • HttpClient strange issue on .net 5.0 and .net 6.0 #76197
  • Reconsider .Net 7 build environment to support mainstream Arm64 distros #76195
  • Unsafe.ReadUnaligned causes System.AccessViolationException on Windows ARM64 #76194
    8.0.0
  • Suspicious values in GenerationInfo SizeBeforeBytes / SizeAfterBytes #76188
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Alternative span/memory/string splitting API #76186
    8.0.0
  • Simplify JIT-EE interface modification #76184
    Future
  • HttpStress, HTTP/3: content mismatch in POST Duplex Slow #76183
  • SPMI should avoid DASM roundtrip for analysis #76178
    8.0.0
  • Optimise Process.PrivateMemorySize64 and similar APIs on Windows #76176
  • RawDefaultValue is resolved differently between runtimes #76174
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Random emcc/clang crashes on perf pipeline #76170
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] perf builds breaking with a linker NRE #76167
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: String.SplitAny #76165
  • Test failure JIT\\Regression\\JitBlue\\Runtime_34937\\Runtime_34937\\Runtime_34937.cmd #76159
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_34937/Runtime_34937/Runtime_34937.sh #76158
    8.0.0
  • Special-case enums in interpolated string handlers #76157
    8.0.0

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: System.Text.Json: Add ReferenceHandler.IgnoreAllCycles to also ignore cycles in collections #76211
  • System.Environment.GetFolderPath (Environment.SpecialFolder.ApplicationData) Is the wrong path on MacOS #40353
    Future
  • Environment.GetFolderPath(Environment.SpecialFolder.MyVideos) returns empty string in OSX #68323
    Future
  • SpecialFolder.MyDocuments / Personal returning wrong path for Unix #63214
    Future
  • JIT tests - Unhandled IOException connection timed out #75867
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 27 Regressions on 8/17/2022 6:09:21 PM #74395
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json can't deserialize type with more than 64 ctor parameters. #71984
    8.0.0
  • Group By Lazy #76152
  • API documentation debt - Microsoft.Extensions.Primitives #43920
    Future
  • [wasm] Perf regression of Span.IndexOf #75709
    7.0.0
  • [MONO][AOT][LLVM][ARM64] Failed to AOT some runtime tests #48915
    8.0.0
  • Incorrect marshalling of IntPtr in union #76175
  • Test failure baseservices/threading/generics/Monitor/EnterExit14/EnterExit14.sh #75997
    7.0.0
  • Investigate removing gtSimdBaseJitType from GenTreeVecCon #70052
    8.0.0
  • [Loc]With .NET6 RTM SDK installed, the texts in CLI are partly unlocalized after running "dotnet --info" #60756
    Future
  • Test failure baseservices\\finalization\\CriticalFinalizer\\CriticalFinalizer.cmd #76161
  • [NativeAOT] Remove m_trackResurrection from weak refence implementations. #75586
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [IGNORE] testing workload installs #76218
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Discount committed when checking for sufficient space #76217
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Decommit free regions when close to OutOfMemory #76216
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm] CI improvements for triggering jobs #76215
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • Ensure end_gen0_region_space is always computed #76214
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Revert "Adapt System.CommandLine (v2) in more places" #76213
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Support containing HWIntrinsics that can operate like a store #76212
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Quote Windows DirectPInvokeList path #76209
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Use new buildpools #76208
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: refactor and enhance the redundant branch optimizer #76207
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Disable NativeAOT subset for source-build. #76206
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Ensure CreateScalarUnsafe gets constant handling on Arm64 #76204
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disabling disasm checks under certain testing environments #76202
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Preserve last error for patchpoint helpers #76200
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] add missing API xml doc #76196
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Add missing xml documentation #76191
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Check if the string is null first before checking if it is a file #76190
    area-System.Configuration, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Do not ignore empty urls in logs #76187
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • JIT: Skip args sort in MinOpts #76185
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Templates nits #76182
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Always expose parents of exposed promoted fields #76181
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] new unit test for duplicate call to ImportAsync #76179
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Fix missing defined and SIMD checks in Sqrt, Floor, Ceiling intrinsics #76177
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [Mono] Implement eager finalization of WeakReference #76173
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] JIT: Use gtCloneExpr in fgMorphModToSubMulDiv for potentially complex trees #76171
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the assert error for `genSetRegToIcon()` #76164
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Reduce Enum.GetEnumName overheads #76162
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Fix bugs found from static analyzer #76160
    area-Meta, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix some incorrect SpecialFolder entries for Unix #68610
    area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, os-linux, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Remove WeakReference.m_trackResurrection field #76115
  • Remove hardcoded limit in deserialization constructor arguments #75982
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [wasm][debugger] Fix debugging an app that has another .NET Wasm instance in a service worker #76073
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [NativeAOT] Ensure that frozen objects respect the minimum object size #76050
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [mono][debugger] fix exception while decoding value that has a byref field #75774
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix assertion in corhlpr #76189
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Update templates to add framework argument #76123
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Don't use write barriers for frozen objects #76135
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc2' => 'release/7.0' #75913
  • [release/7.0] [mono][debugger] fix exception while decoding value that has a byref field #76086
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fold SIMD-typed partial access to locals; delete base types from vector constants #74580
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Disallow TimeSpan.Zero in rate limiters #75496
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • Resolve missing triple-slash in Microsoft.Extensions.Primitives #76098
    area-Extensions-Primitives
  • [mono] Add Vector128 ConditionalSelect intrinsics for Amd64 #75838
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Fix syntax error for `Unknown Architecture` #76172
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [release/7.0] Flow internal transport packages during servicing #75979
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove most of string.Trim() usages in System.Private.Xml solution. #75452
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • perf-pipeline: Remove unnecessary jobs #76111
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, perf-pipeline
  • Enable System.IO.FileSystem tests for native aot #76146
    area-System.IO

Updated

  • Add new version of the ContentionStart event #72627
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Use UTF8 encoding on Tar string fields #75902
    area-System.IO
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix DiagnosticSource to work with NativeAOT #76109
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Issue #75070 - Add PriorityQueue DequeueEnqueue Method #75993
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [Bug] Fix issue #70227 #76143
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Make sure the initial mark list size is capped #76083
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [Mono][Test]Disable failing iossimulator tests #74889
  • Memory model document. #75790
    area-Meta, memory model
  • [release/7.0] Disable EventSource support in NativeAOT by default #76052
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Cross-compile cross-compilers for non-x64 machines #74428
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Support a few "shifted register" operations on Arm64 #75823
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make Type.IsEnum an intrinsic #71685
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [wasm][debugger] Support create, debugging and running wasmbrowser template from VS #76113
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.0
  • Fix spilling of `MUL_LONG` on x86 and multi-reg HWIs #73079
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Pass TargetRid and SourceBuildNonPortable to the native scripts #74504
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • avoid alpn allocation on windows #74619
    area-System.Net.Security, os-windows, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Trying to fix firefox flaky tests on CI. #75090
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Update templates to work for multiple versions #76124
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Test against iOS 16 and MacOS Ventura #74809
    NO-MERGE
  • Reduce allocations around empty ReadOnlyCollections #76097
    area-System.Collections
  • Ensure regions will always have enough memory for the bookkeeping #75038
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr
  • Process primitives in local morph #76155
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • emit branchless form of (i >= 0 && j >= 0)/(i!=0&& j!= 0) for signed integers #62689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Keep all icall wrappers in profile only mode, the generated co… #75918
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • ActivatorUtilities not depending on ctor order for creating instances #75846
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [mono][aot] Prefer specific instances instead of gshared for methods … #76033
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [API Implementation]: Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Remove locks from COM events delegate management. #76034
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.x
  • Fix triple slash documentation for System/System.Numerics #76103
    area-System.Numerics
  • Support running Reflection tests within Visual Studio #75915
    area-System.Reflection, test-enhancement, 8.0.0
  • Adding EVEX encoding support for emitOutputRRR(). #75934
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • WIP: [mono] Include inspection of CustomConstantAttribute when resolving default values for parameters via reflection #75612
    area-System.Reflection-mono
  • [release/7.0] Enable EventSource support in crossgen2 #76056
    Servicing-consider, area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • ZipArchive.CreateEntry: include file type in default ExternalAttributes. #76059
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • docs: add missing document to microsoft.extensions.options #76121
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add Vector128 AndNot intrinsic for amd64 #74586
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • JIT: import static readonly fields holding frozen objects as const handles #76112
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Add Vector128 Negate and OnesComplement intrinsics for amd64 #74993
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Set `AppHostSigningException.ExitCode` #76038
    area-HostModel
  • JIT: Smarter ordering of late args based on register uses #76017
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Publish hostcommon static library #75858
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix debugging an app that has another .NET Wasm instance in a service worker #76072
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Cleanup some math helpers in DecimalCalc #76118
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • JitDisasm cosmetic improvements #75425
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • Some SIMD-related cleanup #73819
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Unroll SpanHelpers.Reverse() for Vector128 #76076
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Improve IPAddress to/from bytes perf #75872
    area-System.Net
  • Improve vectorization of Enumerable.Min/Max #76144
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • 74642 change isostorage path #75541
    area-System.IO
  • Add debugger display for huge BigInteger #75796
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Devirtualize ldarg(s)+callvirt where possible. #75748
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Use generated runtime.json when building shared framework packages. #76068
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Tests for static inherited members. #75512
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • Try moving mobile tests into their own pipelines. #75213
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Improve HTTP/1 response header parsing #74393
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix gtGetClassHandle for static fields (R2R only) #74075
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Implement Console.SetWindowSize() for linux #75824
    area-System.Console, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Bring back ReadOnlySpan in QuicStream #76088
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Replace sign extending moves to normal moves #75837
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Remove XmlConvert.StrEqual and use Span<char>.StartsWith() instead. #74955
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Fix distribute free regions #74916
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Only R2R public methods, methods that override public methods, and internal methods that aren't always inlined #75793
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-26
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: cast unsigned ints to floats using uitofp #1994

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • PublishAot failed with the NETSDK1183 error #28169

Closed

  • dotnet list package --vulnerable --include-transitive does not report all vulnerable packages #28175
  • Slow design-time builds for large solution #27738
    7.0.2xx
  • [Loc]With .NET 7 SDK, the description about "--disable-build-servers" is unlocalized when running "dotnet build --help" in CLI on locale OS. #24040
    7.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Update windows images #28178
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Provide package description for APICompat packages #28167
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #28165
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Read PackageDefinitions and PackageDependencies from the cache assets file instead of ResolvePackageDependencies #28057
  • Provide package description for APICompat packages #28102
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #28161
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #28116
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2004474 #27667
  • revert perma-escaping of semicolons and support semicolon-delimited unquoted property values #27859
    Bug, Area-CLI
  • [`dotnet-new`] Add inRoot option for AddProjectsToSolutionPostAction #27986
    area: dotnet new
  • Improve the example with specified language when language option is given with invalid option #28135
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-26
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Efficient Params and String Formatting #2302
    Working Set
  • params TCollection<T> #2141
  • Proposal: Params everything #1333
  • Feature suggestion: zero-allocation "params" via Span<T> / ReadOnlySpan<T> #535

Updated

  • Proposal: Repeated Attributes in Partial Members #3658
    Any Time
  • [Proposal] Ignored Directives Support #3507
    Working Set
  • Primary Constructors #2691
    Working Set
  • Allow omitting unused parameters #2180
    Backlog
  • C# Feature Request: Allow value tuple deconstruction with default keyword #1358
    Working Set
  • Proposal: Semi-Auto-Properties; `field` keyword #140
    Working Set
  • Proposal: Property-Scoped Fields #133
    Backlog
  • Champion "Permit IEnumerable<T> as the type of a params parameter" #179
    Backlog
  • Champion "params Span<T>" #1757
    Working Set
  • generic constraint: where T : ref struct #1148
    Working Set
  • Champion "pattern-based `with` expressions" #162
    Backlog
  • Champion "permit methods in enum declarations" #297
    Backlog
  • Proposal: Expression blocks #3086
    Working Set
  • Proposal: Enhanced switch statements #3038
    Working Set
  • Proposal: Block-bodied switch expression arms #3037
    Working Set
  • Proposal: Sequence Expressions #377
    Working Set
  • Champion: Name lookup for simple name when target type known #2926
    Working Set
  • Proposal: "Closed" enum types #3179
    Working Set
  • Proposal: "Closed" type hierarchies #485
    Working Set
  • Champion "Discriminated Unions" #113
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Roles and extensions #5497
    Working Set
  • Champion "Type Classes (aka Concepts, Structural Generic Constraints)" #110
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Change ref safety errors to warnings in unsafe contexts #6476
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Implicit parameters #6300
    Backlog
  • [Proposal]: Embedded Language Indicators for raw string literals #6247
  • [Proposal]: ReadOnlySpan initialization from static data #5295
  • Proposal: Track subtype exhaustiveness for classes with only private constructors #4032
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Auto-default structs #5737
    11.0
  • allow references to structs to be stored in fields of ref structs #1147
    11.0
  • Champion "Allow Generic Attributes" #124
    11.0
  • [Proposal]: Relaxing shift operator requirements #4666
    11.0
  • Support for method parameter names in nameof() #373
    11.0
  • [Proposal]: Raw string literal #4304
    11.0
  • Proposal: list pattern #3435
    11.0
  • [Proposal]: Remove restriction that interpolations within a non-verbatim interpolated string cannot contain new-lines. #4935
    11.0
  • [Proposal]: Checked Operators #4665
    11.0
  • Switching ReadOnlySpan<char> with constant strings #1881
    11.0
  • Champion "utf8 string literals" #184
    11.0
  • [Proposal]: Unsigned right shift operator #4682
    11.0
  • Champion: numeric IntPtr #6065
    11.0
  • [Proposal]: Static abstract members in interfaces #4436
    11.0
  • [Proposal] Required Properties #3630
    11.0
  • File-local types #6011
    11.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Relax remaining scenarios with pointer type to managed type #6492

Merged

  • Move C# 11 speclets to sub-folder #6451

Updated

  • Spec out as return only #6483

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • VS refactor suggests an incorrect pattern matching for `!(a?b is true | false)` #64292
  • Error when applying the IDE0059 rule on code with simplified 'new' expression #64291
  • VS2022 C# cannot remove IDE0220 code style warnings #64289
  • Intellisense does not recognize start of string, changes "D: to "Date: #64280
    Backlog

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-32926.152 #64293
  • Roslyn incorrectly report some API as `Not Available ⚠` in IntelliSense list for mulit targetframeworks projects #58478
    17.4
  • Update refereneces to release version for 17.2 rtw #60873
    17.3
  • Hard select default item from IAsyncCompletionDefaultsSource when filter text is empty #61120
    17.3
  • VSIX fails to install on DartLab integration pipeline #63770
    Backlog
  • Confusing error message assigning `in` parameter reference to `ref` field #62756
    17.4

PullRequests

Created

  • include source-generated documents in remote inheritance-margin call #64297
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64296
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Make remaining managed pointer type scenarios warnings #64294
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Update SymbolDisplay API to include scoped for parameters and locals #64285
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • [LSP] Add missing project context handler for ts #64284
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Merge features/CLaSP into main #64282
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Inline Hints - Add narrator support to parameter hints. #64281
    Area-IDE
  • Enhance rule metadata and suppression info in SARIF V2 errorlog #64277
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Update ref `foreach` tests #64276
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Rename Binder.*Scope constants #64288
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/solutionEvents #64301
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/CLaSP #64300
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #64298
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • TextLoader method override detection #64192
    Area-IDE
  • Example is not packable #64133
    Area-IDE
  • [EnC] Follow up on deleting properties and events etc. #64034
    Area-Compilers
  • Make IPreviewService async, or synchronous with threading requirements #63661
    Area-IDE
  • Use AdditionalFilterTexts in enum member completion #64261
    Area-IDE
  • Improve SyntaxTree/Node.Dump() #62703
    Area-Compilers
  • Disallow methods with bodies in ComImport interfaces. #64257
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl
  • Add ChecksumAlgorithm to project snapshot #62840
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • Rename SymbolCompletionProvider to RecommendationServiceBasedCompletionProvider #64026
    Area-IDE
  • Refactor RunTests #63948
    Area-IDE, Area-Infrastructure, Infraswat
  • Colorize langword inside doc comments #63900
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fixed nullable warning for "change cast type" refactoring #64080
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Format parameters as names in error messages #64179
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support configuring document-level parts of OpenAPI schema #44192
    .NET 8 Planning
  • .NET 7.0: Output Caching: Evaluate policy after other middleware processed the request #44191
  • Please reinstate Microsoft.AspNetCore.SpaServices for .NET 6 LTS #44187
  • Quarantine `ClosingTheBrowserWindow_GracefullyDisconnects_TheCurrentCircuit` #44185
  • Adding a css file as a linked file, does not work #44184
  • Publishing a server hosted wasm app fails in dotnet 7 rc1 #44182
  • [SignalR] HTTPS connection failed, and The server disconnected before the handshake could be started. #44181
  • How to properly destroy javascript component and avoid JSDisconnectedException #44180
  • Change docs.microsoft.com links to learn.microsoft.com #44175

Closed

  • Quarantine ClosingTheBrowserWindow_GracefullyDisconnects_TheCurrentCircuit #44017
    8.0-MQ
  • Add an Analyzer to recommend using DIM properties with IHeaderDictionary instead of indexer #44116
    .NET 8 Planning
  • ASP.NET Core v6.0.8 source build sucessed and installed ,but enter f11 can't view source code #43673
  • Mariner queue crash in Microsoft.AspNetCore.SignalR.Common.Tests #41481
    Test failures
  • DotNetObjectReference in docs multiple instances created, only last one disposed #44189
  • .NET 7 RC1 ASP.Net Core Output Caching: Memory leak in MemoryOutputCacheStore? #44169
  • [Blazor WASM] Getting value from resx always return default value. #44150
  • Get child tag by name #44163
  • SPA proxying breaks with double-slash at beginning of path #43662
    8.0-preview1

Created

  • CollectionView Drag & Drop Item Reordering Spec #3767
    Backlog
  • ListView and CollectionView do not scroll in a VerticalStackLayout #7386
